20110118220153.000|20110118220155.000|TR0|THELMA GUTIERREZ, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  
20110118220155.000|20110118220158.000|TR0|Well, Wolf, they have talked to more than 
20110118220158.000|20110118220200.000|TR0|300 people since last Saturday.  They say 
20110118220200.000|20110118220202.000|TR0|it's a very daunting task to try to piece 
20110118220202.000|20110118220204.000|TR0|together what may have prompted Jared 
20110118220204.000|20110118220207.000|TR0|Loughner to go on this terrible rampage.  
20110118220207.000|20110118220209.000|TR0|They also say that they have pieced 
20110118220209.000|20110118220211.000|TR0|together part of the time line.  That has 
20110118220211.000|20110118220213.000|TR0|not been as difficult.  What has been much 
20110118220213.000|20110118220216.000|TR0|more challenging is trying to figure out 
20110118220216.000|20110118220218.000|TR0|who Jared Loughner was and who he had 
20110118220218.000|20110118220220.000|TR0|become. So they're talking to friends, 
20110118220220.000|20110118220222.000|TR0|family, anyone who could have crossed 
20110118220222.000|20110118220225.000|TR0|paths with him.
20110118220225.000|20110118220227.000|TR0|
20110118220227.000|20110118220229.000|TR0|One of those people was the owner of the 
20110118220229.000|20110118220232.000|TR0|Sacred Art Tattoo Shop.  His name is Lenny 
20110118220232.000|20110118220234.000|TR0|Mental.  And Lenny says that Jared 
20110118220234.000|20110118220236.000|TR0|Loughner came to see him twice, once in 
20110118220236.000|20110118220238.000|TR0|October and then another time just a 
20110118220238.000|20110118220241.000|TR0|couple of weeks ago.
20110118220241.000|20110118220243.000|TR0|
20110118220243.000|20110118220245.000|TR0|He said that Loughner came in.  He had a 
20110118220245.000|20110118220247.000|TR0|.9 millimeter bullet.  And he told them 
20110118220247.000|20110118220250.000|TR0|that he wanted a tattoo of this .9 
20110118220250.000|20110118220252.000|TR0|millimeter bullet on the back of his 
20110118220252.000|20110118220254.000|TR0|shoulder.  And he says that he told the 
20110118220254.000|20110118220256.000|TR0|agents that he didn't see anything 
20110118220256.000|20110118220259.000|TR0|menacing about Loughner at the moment.  He 
20110118220259.000|20110118220301.000|TR0|thought he was very weird because he 
20110118220301.000|20110118220303.000|TR0|talked about mind control and being able 
20110118220303.000|20110118220305.000|TR0|to control his dreams, that kind of thing. 
20110118220305.000|20110118220308.000|TR0| But he says he told the agents he didn't 
20110118220308.000|20110118220310.000|TR0|see anything else beyond that.

20110118220353.000|20110118220355.000|TR0|past.  One of those people is his jazz 
20110118220355.000|20110118220358.000|TR0|instructor.  His name is Doug Tideback.  
20110118220358.000|20110118220400.000|TR0|Tideback says he was the one who worked 
20110118220400.000|20110118220402.000|TR0|with Loughner for many years, since he was

20110118220404.000|20110118220407.000|TR0|talented jazz musician.  He played John 
20110118220407.000|20110118220409.000|TR0|Coltrane and Duke Ellington.  And he says

20110118220436.000|20110118220438.000|TR0|every Saturday for five years.  And he

20110118220706.000|20110118220708.000|TR0|anybody ever will be able to answer that 
20110118220708.000|20110118220710.000|TR0|question, because you're talking about 
20110118220710.000|20110118220712.000|TR0|irrational behavior.  And when you try to 
20110118220712.000|20110118220715.000|TR0|rationalize it, it comes out zero.
20110118220715.000|20110118220717.000|TR0|
20110118220717.000|20110118220719.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Is it fair to say that this 
20110118220719.000|20110118220722.000|TR0|alleged shooter is insane?

20110118220728.000|20110118220731.000|TR0|he engaged in very unusual, bizarre 
20110118220731.000|20110118220733.000|TR0|behavior.
20110118220733.000|20110118220735.000|TR0|

20110118220816.000|20110118220818.000|TR0|have -- because we've seen all the public

20110118220820.000|20110118220823.000|TR0|motivated by politics?
20110118220823.000|20110118220825.000|TR0|
20110118220825.000|20110118220827.000|TR0|DUPNIK:  Why, there's -- there's no way to 
20110118220827.000|20110118220829.000|TR0|know what motivated him. You know, he 
20110118220829.000|20110118220832.000|TR0|seemed to be fixated on -- on 
20110118220832.000|20110118220834.000|TR0|Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords from 
20110118220834.000|20110118220836.000|TR0|2007, when he intended -- attended an 
20110118220836.000|20110118220839.000|TR0|almost identical event.  And she had sent 
20110118220839.000|20110118220841.000|TR0|him a letter.  And he was very upset with 
20110118220841.000|20110118220843.000|TR0|her because he asked her some very strange 
20110118220843.000|20110118220845.000|TR0|question, to which there was no rational 
20110118220845.000|20110118220848.000|TR0|answer.  And he was very, very upset about 
20110118220848.000|20110118220850.000|TR0|that and went on for quite a while talking 
20110118220850.000|20110118220852.000|TR0|to his friends about how she ought to be 
20110118220852.000|20110118220854.000|TR0|able to answer his question and she 
20110118220854.000|20110118220857.000|TR0|couldn't.
20110118220857.000|20110118220859.000|TR0|
20110118220859.000|20110118220901.000|TR0|BLITZER:  As far as you know, did he 
20110118220901.000|20110118220903.000|TR0|attend any other Giffords' events between

20110118220940.000|20110118220942.000|TR0|his parents?
20110118220942.000|20110118220944.000|TR0|
20110118220944.000|20110118220947.000|TR0|DUPNIK:  Yes, they are.  The parents have 
20110118220947.000|20110118220949.000|TR0|always been cooperative with us.  And it's 
20110118220949.000|20110118220951.000|TR0|very -- it's been very, very devastating 
20110118220951.000|20110118220953.000|TR0|for them.
20110118220953.000|20110118220956.000|TR0|
20110118220956.000|20110118220958.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Without getting into any 
20110118220958.000|20110118221000.000|TR0|violation of confidentiality or 
20110118221000.000|20110118221002.000|TR0|undermining the investigation, can you 
20110118221002.000|20110118221005.000|TR0|share anything that they're saying to you?
20110118221005.000|20110118221007.000|TR0|
20110118221007.000|20110118221009.000|TR0|DUPNIK:  The fact of the matter is, Wolf, 
20110118221009.000|20110118221011.000|TR0|they had absolutely no way to predict this 
20110118221011.000|20110118221014.000|TR0|kind of behavior and they were just as 
20110118221014.000|20110118221016.000|TR0|shocked as everyone else.
20110118221016.000|20110118221018.000|TR0|
20110118221018.000|20110118221020.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Because a lot of people find 
20110118221020.000|20110118221023.000|TR0|that strange, given the evidence that has 
20110118221023.000|20110118221025.000|TR0|mountain -- mounted over these past 10 
20110118221025.000|20110118221027.000|TR0|days that he was engaged in all sorts of 
20110118221027.000|20110118221030.000|TR0|bizarre behavior.  He was living with his 
20110118221030.000|20110118221032.000|TR0|parents.  You would think they would have 
20110118221032.000|20110118221034.000|TR0|seen some irrational behavior and would 
20110118221034.000|20110118221036.000|TR0|have advised him to begin some sort of

20110118225532.000|20110118225535.000|TR0|you know, Camden is like so many cities in 
20110118225535.000|20110118225537.000|TR0|the United States facing a massive 
20110118225537.000|20110118225539.000|TR0|deficit.  But this stands out because of 
20110118225539.000|20110118225542.000|TR0|the size of the cuts being made here and

20110118225544.000|20110118225546.000|TR0|

20110118225548.000|20110118225551.000|TR0|that last-minute concessions will mean 
20110118225551.000|20110118225553.000|TR0|that laid-off workers can come back to 
20110118225553.000|20110118225555.000|TR0|work.  But so far, that hasn't happened.

20110118225604.000|20110118225606.000|TR0|firefighters and police officers in 
20110118225606.000|20110118225609.000|TR0|Camden, New Jersey, were dreading.  More

20110118225631.000|20110118225634.000|TR0|crime rate in the country, yet the deepest 
20110118225634.000|20110118225636.000|TR0|cuts are to the Camden Police Department, 
20110118225636.000|20110118225638.000|TR0|where 168 officers were laid off.  That's 
20110118225638.000|20110118225640.000|TR0|45 percent of the force.
